entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is described as a place where it stands towering over other little shops. It is also mentioned that the liveried goblins who usually flank Gringotts are not present.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is walking alongside Harry and Griphook. He is also mentioned as someone that Harry cannot communicate with due to Travers matching at Bellatrix's side.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is described as a goblin who has already warned them about the liveried goblins not being present. He is also mentioned as someone walking alongside Harry and Ron.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who cannot communicate with Hermione or Ron due to Travers matching at Bellatrix's side. He is also mentioned as walking alongside Griphook and Ron.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone that Harry cannot communicate with due to Travers matching at Bellatrix's side.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as the person that Travers believes he is matching at. She is also mentioned in relation to Hermione and Ron, implying she may be a threat.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is described as someone who believes he is matching at Bellatrix's side. He is also mentioned as the reason why Harry cannot communicate with Hermione or Ron.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are unable to communicate with each other due to Travers matching at Bellatrix's side.
Harry and Ron are unable to communicate with each other due to Travers matching at Bellatrix's side.
Travers believes he is matching at Bellatrix's side, which prevents Harry from communicating with Hermione or Ron.
